The tests seem to be passing of late.

This may be related to the edit models being cached in HashMaps in
EMFWorkbenchContext.  This class needs to be more careful with its edit model cache:

*** Bug 104237 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

We just upgraded to WTP 0.7 I20050823 and we're still seeing the
HIERARCHY_REQUEST_ERR stacktrace reported in bug 104237, which is marked as a
duplicate of this bug. On my local machine it seems to happen about half the
time we make the call while creating a project. The HIERARCHY_REQUEST_ERR
stacktrace gets printed to the console, and an additional exception appears in
the log file:
